title: balumOsa mayanuraa
sahitya:
balumOsa mayyanurA bAgAyarA sAmi



anupallavi



 cilukala palukumATa ceviniNDerA sAmi taLuku mATalu cAlu tallaTiillaDanEla



svara sAhityam



nI sukhambulanu niratamu hrdayamunanu satatamu koniyADi ramincina paNatirA

 paravanitalu balumOha-mAyavacpaDi neneru maraciti gadarA sadaya shrI harikEsha 



caraNam



 bhaLi bhaLira nI naData paNadula neccuDa vinda
